'''Goomy''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ヌメラ''' ''Numera'') is a {{type|Dragon}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation VI]].

It [[evolution|evolves]] into {{p|Sliggoo}} starting at [[level]] 40, which evolves into {{p|Goodra}} starting at level 50 when leveled up during [[rain]] in the overworld.

==Biology==
[[File:Ash Goomy melted.png|thumb|250px|left|Goomy's dried out body]]
Goomy looks like a light purple, vaguely slug-like pile of goo. The top half of its body is a lighter purple than its bottom half, and the two halves are separated by a squiggly, dark purple outline decorated with five green dots. It has beady eyes, and it has two rows of two horn-like structures on top of its head.

Goomy is widely considered the weakest Dragon-type Pokémon. Its body is made mostly of water. Once it dries out, it is unable to breathe and dies. Because of this, it hides in damp and shady places, such as swamps, to keep its body slimy. This slime is germ-laden, and makes punches and kicks aimed at it slide off harmlessly. It uses its sensitive horns to check out its surroundings. As seen in the anime, its diet consists of leaves.

==In the anime==
[[File:Ash Goomy.png|left|thumb|250px|Goomy in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
====[[Ash's Goomy]]====
Goomy debuted in ''[[XY055|A Slippery Encounter!]]''. It was later caught by {{Ash}}. In ''[[XY061|An Oasis of Hope!]]'', Goomy evolved into {{p|Sliggoo}}; and in ''[[XY065|Good Friends, Great Training!]]'', Sliggoo evolved again into {{p|Goodra}}.

===Minor appearances===
A Goomy appeared in ''[[XY073|A Fashionable Battle!]]''.

Three Goomy appeared during a flashback in ''[[SS036|The Legend of X, Y, and Z!]]'', with one belonging to a {{pkmn|Trainer}} and the other two being wild.

[[File:Team Flare Goomy Adventures.png|thumb|150px|Goomy in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the [[Pokémon Adventures]] manga===
A Goomy appeared with its Trainer in [[Santalune City]] in ''[[PAXY05|Kangaskhan...Kangascan't]]''.

In ''[[PAXY23|Gyarados Changes]]'', two {{tc|Team Flare Grunt}}s used two Goomy to try and prevent {{adv|X}} and [[Emma]] from entering the [[Team Flare Secret HQ]]. They were easily sent flying with the psychic powers of Emma's {{p|Espurr|Mimi}}.

==Trivia==
* Goomy is both the [[List of Pokémon by weight|lightest]] and shortest {{type|Dragon}} Pokémon.
* Goomy ties with {{p|Noibat}} for having the lowest base {{stat|Defense}} of any {{type|Dragon}} Pokémon.
* Goomy was designed by [[Saya Tsuruta]].
<!--Please do not put anything about Goomy or Noibat being the weakest Dragon-type.-->

===Origin===
Goomy greatly resembles the prehistoric ''{{wp|wiwaxia}}''. Goomy seems to be based on soft bodied gastropods, such as {{wp|slug}}s and {{wp|nudibranch}}; its typing and eventual dragon design in evolution may be a reference to the {{wp|Glaucus atlanticus|"blue dragon" sea slug}}. It may also be based upon the concept of living slime in popular culture.

====Name origin====
Goomy may be a combination of ''goo'' and either ''gummy'' or ''slimy''.

Numera is derived from 滑る ''numeru'' (to be slippery) and ぬらぬら ''nuranura'' (onomatopoetic word for slimy).
